column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=Last month I went to Shag to get a haircut from my stylist , Bridgit .
#text=I like to have short hair so I told her she could do whatever she wanted to my hair .
#text=She shaved the sides and back and cut the top very close , then used thinning shears to thin out the top of my hair .
#text=After she was done cutting my hair , she led me to the hair washing station to get all the loose hairs off .
#text=She washed and conditioned my hair then took me back to her chair .
#text=She used a blow dryer to dry my hair and put product in to make it look shiny and stay in place .
#text=She gave me advice on how to best style it and then finished my hair with some hairspray .
#text=When she was done we went to the cash register so she could ring me up .
#text=I paid in cash and left a large tip because I liked the haircut a lot .
